nodes.text: "A Jedi's Tale" is a short story written by Calliope Glass with illustrations by Katie Cook that was published in the young readers book Star Wars Galactic Storybook released January 6, 2021. It adapts the tale of Anakin Skywalker throughout the prequel trilogy.

During the Invasion of Naboo, after fighting the Trade Federation Droid Army, the Jedi Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi travel to Tatooine. They meet Anakin Skywalker, who agrees to help win the Boonta Eve podrace so they can repair their ship. The Jedi then meet the Jedi High Council, but they refused to train the boy. They then return to Naboo to fight in the Invasion, and face Darth Maul. Jinn was struck down, but Kenobi defeated the Sith Lord. Skywalker also joins the battle, blowing up the Trade Federation starship.

Skywalker then grew into a Jedi, but was caught up in the machinations of Darth Sidious. He and his friends beocme trapped in the Petranaki arena with beasts. Skywalker continued to grow stronger, even defeating Count Dooku. Supreme Chancellor Palpatine, secretly Darth Sidious, corrupted Skywalker. Kenobi tried to stop him, but Skywalker attacked him. The Jedi known as Skywalker was then lost. Amidala was heartbroken, but her last act was to give birth to their children. Skywalker was reborn as Vader, and the twins were safely scattered.
